description.en: Topics that are covered in the course include:"	Bayesian decision theory: the theoretical statistical basis for recognition based on Bayes theorem from probability"	Maximum-likelihood and Bayesian parameter estimation: parameters of probability density functions"	Nonparametric techniques: Parzen window, k-nearest neighbor"	Linear discriminant functions: gradient descent, relaxation, minimum squared-error procedures such as LMS, and support vector machines"	Algorithm-independent machine learning"	Unsupervised learning and clusteringThe course is quite mathematical.  Students enrolling this class are expected to have a good understanding of probability and random variables, both one-dimensional and multi-dimensional, and a good background in linear algebra as well as calculus.  Some of the necessary math will be reviewed at the beginning of the course, but it is only a quick review, not a math course.Grades will be based on homework, tests, and small computer projects.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹基因工程學之基礎知識。內容包括寄主細胞的選擇：細菌、酵母菌、真菌等微生物或昆蟲細胞、哺乳類動物細胞等動物細胞或者是植物細胞。聚合連鎖反應、基因轉殖、質體轉型、病毒轉換、基因槍等常用的基因工程學之方法。
description.en: This course is to introduce basic knowledge of genetic engineering, including the selection of host cells, bacterial, yeast, fungi, insect cell, mammalian cell, or plant cell. The powerful methods of genetic engineering, including polymerase chain reaction (PCR), gene clone, plasmid transformation, virus transduction, and biolistics are also introduced in this course.

name.zh: 細菌生理學與生化工程

description.zh: 細菌為基因工程中最常用的寄主細胞。在生化反應器中扮演一個個小反應器，生產人類所要的產物。這個小反應器中的變化當然影嚮產物的製程。本課程即是介紹與生化工程相關之細菌生理。包含生長速率控制、嚴酷環境回應、熱休克回應、DNA修復等。
description.en: Bacterial is the most common host cell of genetic engineering. It plays a tiny reactor in bioreactor to generate our desired products. The change of this tiny reactor, physiology, has influence on the process. This course is to introduce bacterial physiology related to biotechnology. It includes growth rate control, stringent response, heat shock response, DNA repair and so on.

description.zh: 本課程將探討明渠中穩定流、非穩定流、均勻流、非均勻流之流體特性。
description.en: Open channel hydraulics treats the motion of water in conduits that have a free surface, that is, in which the flow of water is not completely bounded by the channel perimeter and one surface is exposed to atmospheric pressure.  The flows can be steady (time-invariant) or unsteady, uniform (space-invariant) or non-uniform (gradually, rapidly, or spatially varied).  For engineers, open channels are very common for the conveyance of natural waters, storm discharges, sewage collection systems, and aqueducts for water distribution systems. Knowledge of the mechanics of open-channel flow, then, is important for the proper design of these facilities.

description.en: The course of solidification principles dealing with the fundamentals of metal and alloy solidification and how to relate these fundamentals to practice and control. Based upon the fundamentals of heat flow mass transport and nucleation crystal growth to discuss about solidification mechanisms. This course is suitable for senior-level and graduate students.

description.en: introduction to gem identification

description.zh: 藉由對戶外公共空間意象表徵、地方環境的特色、歷史文化的痕跡及氣候之特性等的分析研究，配合週遭景觀及時代性，進而針對生活上的需求並提出具有創意的戶外公共家具設計的思維。
description.en: Lecture on theories of space superficial characteristics, environmental characteristics, history and culture influence. Discussing on relative research in the field of street furniture design will be carried on through the course. Case studies on application of street furniture design will be given for in depth discussions.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 探討趨勢研究之理論與實務，其中包括：生活形態、流行及科技發展之趨勢。研究主題尚包括地域與文化所造成的趨勢差異、趨勢對產品設計之影響及趨勢之應用研究等。
description.en: Current theories and practices of trend study are covered, including trends of living style, fashion and technology development. Topics covered include: regional and cultural difference in trends, influences of trends in product design and application study of trends.

description.zh: 人工智慧之軟式運算技術，包括基因演算法、類神經網路等，是向生物及自然演化現象取法的數種機器學習技術，提供模仿生物決策思維的系統分析方法，也開啟其於土木工程領域系統決策分析應用的研究方向。近年來電腦資訊科技的突飛猛進，催化人工智慧領域軟式運算技術的快速發展，並融入或然率之概念，發展非唯一解類神經網路、機率類神經網路、壓縮類神經網路及贅餘基因演算法等於土木工程領域之各種應用。課程中並配合作業、論文研討、報告及實際軟體介紹、操作以幫助學習。
description.en: Soft computing methods of artificial intelligence, including genetic algorithm and artificial neural network, are biologically inspired machine learning technology.  A genetic algorithm, which is a computational model that imitates the process of Darwinian evolution, is emerging as a powerful tool in optimization and design problems.  Neural networks provide massively parallel computational models and adaptive systems with properties of noise and fault tolerance as well as learning capacity.  All these classes of methods share some basic characteristics that are inherently different than those of traditional mathematically based engineering analysis.  This course will also introduce the recent progress on application of soft computing methods in civil engineering.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

name.zh: 數位廣播接收機之原理及實作
name.en: Principles and Implementation of Digital Audio Broadcasting

Brief introduction to CA (Conditional Access) and MOT (Multimedia Object Type) protocal

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 繞射光學元件是基於光波繞射的原理，以VLSI技術為加工方法，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、尤其是微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：(1)光學繞射原理(2)傅式光學概論(3)繞射光學元件介紹(4)性能分析方法(5)繞射光學元件之設計方法(6)繞射光學元件之應用(7)繞射光學元件之製作
description.en: Diffractive optical element (DOE) is based on optical wavefront diffraction on a phase profile that is commonly generated by VLSI techniques. DOE's can be applied on conventional optical systems as well as advanced opto-electronic systems. In this course, we will discuss in detail the basic pricioples, design methods, and others about DOE's. The following topics will be introduced:(1)Introduction to Diffraction theory(2)Overview of Fourier optics(3)Diffractive optical elements (DOE's)(4)Performance evaluation of DOE's(5)Design methods for DOE's(6)Applications of DOE's(7)Fabrication tecjniqies of DOE's

description.zh: (1)簡介 (2)光波的傳播與繞射 (3)非均勻介質中光波的傳播 (4)透鏡成像處理系統 (5)光學空間濾波技術 (6)全像術 (8) 光學影像處理實例與實作
description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Propagation and Diffraction of Optical Waves (3) Optical Propagation in Inhomogeneous (4) Lens Image Processing Systems (5) Optical Spatial Filtering Techniques (6) Holography (7) Case study

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

name.en: Advanced Integrated Circuit Fabrication Process and Lab.

description.zh: 前段製程：包含物理沈積、化學沈積、微影、蝕刻等製程。深入探討最新的製程技術及研究方向。後段製程：包含各種IC封裝的技術及測試方法、並深入探討最新的研究方向。
description.en: Review of the basic IC fabrication Process, Study the state of art of the Fabrication Process, especially about technology and facilities. Including PVD, CVD, doping heat process.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一，廣用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹、相關配備、原理與能量提供方式、將包括：沉積技術與應用、化學氣相沉積法、物理氣相沉積法、電鍍技術、真空工程、直流電源、射頻電源、微波、熱燈絲等各種能量介紹、以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically. This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc.. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new files coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior file qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the student or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。一、幾何光學：光學基本定律、球面光學系統成像、雷射光傳播特性、光纖、輻射度學與光度學。二、物理光學：光的電磁理論、光波的疊加與分析、光的干涉與干涉儀、光學鍍膜、光的繞射、光的偏振、晶體光學基礎。

description.en: A general background in fluid mechanic and use of mechanical laboratory machinery equipment. The course Hydrau-servo Systems introduces the varied aspects of Pneumatic and Hydraulic Servo System Servo and Proportional Valves, Electro-hydraulic Servo-valves, Electro-hydraulic Servomechanisms and Hydra-mechanical Servo-mechanisms. The course in programming is one third time of lectures and the other of laboratory practices.

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程將深入的討論製程中材料之性質。尤其是在材料行為的理論推導方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：塑性加工、顯微結構、強化機構、破壞力學、潛變與疲勞、材料之熱膨脹、熱傳導、電化學性質、擴散理論、相變化動力學、化學性質、以及材料之熱力學性質。
description.en: The properties of materials in service will be discussed in detail.  Special focus will be on the theoretically discussion of the behavior of materials.  Topics covered include plastic deformation、strengthening mechanisms、fracture、creep and fatigue、heat capacity、thermal expansion、thermal conductivity、the law of electrolysis、electrolytic conductance and transport, and ionic activity、reversible electrode potentials、Irreversible electrode processes、electrochemical measurements、kinetics of phase transformation、diffusion、kirkendall effect、thermodynamic properties of alloy systems、thermodynamics of surfaces and interfaces

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.en: Calculus of Variations and Application, Integral Equations, Green Function, Advance Complex Variables, Asymptotic Expansion of Integrals, Purturbation Methods

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

description.zh: 國際間基於永續發展之目標，及建立循環型體系之趨勢，各國均選擇適當區域來推動生態化工業，促進產業間投入與產出面之關聯性連結，進而從循環型產業擴展至生態都市及循環型城鄉與社會。本課程將配合國內環保科技園區推展現況及實際須求來授課, 內容包括國際循環型產業, 生態工業系統原則, 運作效益, 清潔生產,廢棄物資源化網路架構等。
description.en: Establishing Ecology Industry and recycle-oriented society has been a current trend in the world.  Starting from building up the linkage ofthe inputs and outputs between Industries, recycle-oriented concepts can be further expended to build eco-town and eco-city. The main purpose of  this course is to learn the Industrial Ecology, principals of Eco-Industrial Park, Pollution Prevention, Cleaner Production, Waste recycle and resource recovery networks, etc.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。
description.en: main -machine Interface (MMI)1.Introduction to automation 2.Perosn computer Interface 3.Platform of main machine interface :Windows operation system. 4.Windows Application program Interface :DLL,DDE and active X program design.5. Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.en: The selected topic course is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in planning of evaluation project.

description.zh: 討論多醣體在科技產業上的運用
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry and glycobiology. Students are expected to discuss about the industrial application of polysaccharide.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 課程內容主要探討決策方法，如：機率推理、資料包絡分析、多屬性決策分析、階層式分析等，再討論到如何視覺化呈現分析結果，以輔助決策者作決策，進而探討如何建構一決策支援系統。
description.en: This course discusses the fundamental decision theories including probabilistic reasoning, data envelopment analysis, multiple criteria decision analysis, and analytic hierarchy process etc., and then talks about how to visually present the results and assist decision makers to make a decision. The topic of how to design a decision support system is also covered.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹電腦多媒體系統的發展。不同的媒體種類的處理以及相關的技術與概念，將在本課程中作介紹。其中包括電腦圖學，電腦動畫，電腦聲音與音樂，以及電腦視訊。商用的多媒體系統，以及研究階段的多媒體作家系統，也將涵蓋在課程的範圍之中。對多媒體的現今技術與未來，作系統性的討論與說明。課程大綱:多媒體系統簡介，多媒體市場，多媒體套裝，基本媒體--聲音，視訊，影像，動畫，文字；整合環境與套裝--書頁模式，連結模式，邏輯編排模式，展示模式；未來趨勢。
description.en: This course will look the multimedia development in computer science domain. Various media, such sound, video, graphic and animation, will be examined first to illustrate their usage in a computerized environment. Commercial packages will be employed to exercise the multimedia application in selected areas thereafter. Course Outline: Introduction to Multimedia; Multimedia Market; Multimedia Production Packages; Basic Media (Basics & Hardware/Software) - Audio, Video, Image, Animation, Text; Composition Environment/Packages -- Page-Oriented, Node-Link Oriented, Scripting, Demonstration; Future Trend.

description.zh: 1.機率理論基礎 2.隨機變數之產生 3.隨機過程基礎 4.Markovian 排隊系統分析5.Semi-Markovian 排隊系統分析 6.開放及封閉型排隊網路分析 7.隨機存取/網路系統之效能分析 8.系統輸入模式之建立 9.交換網路之模型建立與分析
description.en: 1.Probability theory review 2.Random variates generations 3.Introduction to stochastic processes 4.Simple Markovian queueing systems 5.Semi-Markovian queueing systems 6.Open and closed queueing networks 7.Performance evaluation of random access networks 8.Traffic modelling  9.Switching networks

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 1. 電力科技之改革2. 世界各國電力自由化發展3. 電力交換組織架構4. 獨立系統操作組織架構5. 電力庫制度6. 損失計算7. 電價計算
description.en: 1. Revolutions of power Technologies2. The development of deregulation in the world3. Organization of power exchange4. Organization of independent system operator5. power pool6. Power wheeling7. Calculations of losses8. Calculations of electric prices

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 1.需求面管理與節約能源2.負載管理策略與成效評估3.負載監控與需量控制管理4.汽電共生及其他能源應用5.配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

description.zh: 這門課程主要的目的為提供學生們有關於資料庫系統的進階內容，包含：1.	最佳化查詢2.	資料庫回復技術3.	資料庫安全與權限4.	物件式與物件關連式資料庫5.	分散式資料庫與主從式架構6.	主動式資料庫7.	時間資料庫8.	演譯式資料庫9.	多媒體資料庫10.	行動式資料庫11.	XML與網際網路資料庫12.	資料倉儲與資料探勘
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with the advanced concepts in current database systems, including: 1.	Query Processing and Optimization2.	Database Recovery Techniques3.	Security and Authorization4.	Object and Object-Relational Databases5.	Distributed Databases and Client-Server Architecture 6.	Active Databases 7.	Temporal Databases 8.	Deductive Databases 9.	Multimedia Databases 10.	Mobile Databases11.	XML and Internet Databases12.	Data Warehousing and Data Mining

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統(Geographical Information System，簡稱GIs)之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

description.zh: 1.高層建物之實態與傾向2.高層建物之火災災例分析3.高層建物火災時避難安全問題4.避難安全設計5.高層建物之火災安全對策6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Situation & Development of High-rise Buildings2.Analysis for High-rise Building in Fire3.Evacuation Safety on High-rise Building Fires4.Designing for Evacuation Safety5.Strategies of Fire Protection for High-rise Buildings6.Case Study

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。
description.en: This course aims to enhance oral and written communication skills and in the process provide a greater understanding of the philosophy underlying academic discourse. Weekly units are oriented around a progressive series of tasks which consider academic texts in context and require learners to understand, analyse and produce spoken and written texts appropriate to the context of academic English. The contextualisation of these tasks is the philosophical aspects of critical analysis. Themes, such as the difference between convention, fact, opinion and preference; deductive and inductive proof; validity and truth; evidence; and the ethics of persuasion, are the basis on which the skills are taught.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 介紹產品計畫觀念、方法及主要工作項目，並整合趨勢研究之理論與實務，其中包括：生活形態、流行及科技發展之趨勢、地域與文化所造成的趨勢差異、趨勢對產品設計之影響及趨勢之應用研究等。
description.en: An introduction of basic concept, procedure, and working element of product planning. Current theories and practices of trend study are covered, including trends of living style, fashion and technology development. Culture influences on fashion and its practical application will be included.

description.zh: 線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用
description.en: Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Control theory

description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。

name.zh: 系統雛形與軟硬體設計
name.en: System Prototyping and Hardware Software Design

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使學生學習利用FPGA系統來完成一個系之設計與驗證的方法，同時在系設計過程了解如何從系統規格之下做軟硬體的分割，進而學習系統之軟體及硬體之設計技術，系統設計的功能之正確性的驗證方法也將在本課程中探考。本課程之大綱如下所示：1.系統設計簡介2.系統雛型平台3.系統軟硬體分割技術4.FPGA系統之嵌入式處理器5.系統軟體設計6.系統硬體設計7.系統整合及仿效8.系統功能驗證9.設計實例
description.en: The goal of this course is that the students will learn a system design and verification methodology under a provided system protoyping platform. First, the system partitioning techniques will be applied from given a system specification. Then, system hardware and software design method base on FPGA systems will be implemented and studies,respectively. Finally, System functional verification techniques will be discussed. The outline of this course are shown as follows:1.Introduction to System Design Methodology 2.System Prototyping Platform 3.Hardware-Software Partitioning Techniques 4.Embedded Processor in FPGA system 5.Software Design for Embedded Processor of FPGA Based Systems 6.Hardware Design for FPGA Based Systems 7.System Integrated and Emulation 8.System Functional Verification 9.Design Case Study.

description.zh: 1.導論2.無失真壓縮技術3.量化與轉換編碼4.動作估計與動作補償5.MPEG視訊編碼標準6.視訊編碼在傳輸時的考量7.無線傳播通道8.無線通訊系統之數位調變技術9.無線通訊系統之通道編碼技術10.多重路徑衰落通道之應對技術11.無線多媒體通訊系統與標準
description.en: 1.Introductions 2.Entropy coding 3.Rate-distortion theory and quantization 4.Motion compensation and Interframe coding5.MPEG video coding 6.Multimedia transmission 7.Wireless propagation channels 8.Digital modulation in wireless systems 9.Channel coding in wireless systems 10.Schemes to overcome multipath fading 11.Standards of wireless multimedia communication systems

name.zh: 功率控制積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計功率控制積體電路設計,進而能培養學生具有設計功率控制積體電路設計的能力,課程內容包含： 1. 介紹 2. 被動元件 3. 功率開關 4. 交流-直流電源轉換  5. 直流-交流電源轉換6. 交流-交流電源轉換7 偏壓電路 8. 運算放大器 9. 參考電路 10. 邏輯控制電路 11. 電流感測電路 12. 保護電路 13. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power control integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power control integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2. Passive components 3. Power switches 4.AC-DC power conversion 5. DC-AC conversion 6. AC-AC conversion 7. Bias circuits 8. Operational amplifiers 9. Reference circuits 10. Logic control circuits 11. Current sensing circuits 12. Protection circuits 13. Case study

description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

name.en: Seminar of Services Marketing and Management

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務行銷與管理，內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務環境（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）顧客價值管理（10）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）servicescape, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）customer value management,（10）service pricing.

description.zh: 隨著科技的衝擊、政治力量的干預，企業在面對快速且無法掌握的巨變環境下，常產生財務或管理上之危機，如何強化公司治理，以達成經營目標，現已成為企業界熱門的課題。而為強化公司治理，領導者需面對不同的挑戰，如領導者的反應時間縮短等情境。本課程即在於探討如何確保公司的領導者善盡其對公司治理的責任，同時兼顧管理的自由度，以及運用公司資源創造利潤分享成果的制度。
description.en: With the technical impact and political intervention, the enterprise faces more and more financial and management crisis. How the company to strengthen management and to achieve its goal has already become a popular topic. However, in order to strengthen the ability to government, the leader must face different challenges such as the reduction of leader's reaction time. The object of this course is to explore that how the leader takes the responsibility of governing the company and pays his or her attention to the degree of freedom simultaneously and uses company resources to create profit sharing achievement system.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程針對網際服務應用軟體(Web-based Applications)特性，透過原理與實作的結合，引導學生有效統合軟體工程原理、觀念、方法、與技術，以建立網際服務軟體工程程序(Web-based software engineering process)，開發高品質網際服務軟體。課程內容包括下列主題：一、網際服務軟體工程概論二、網際服務應用系統架構三、網際服務軟體開發程序四、網際服務軟體程序框架五、網際服務系統規劃與分析六、網際服務軟體設計七、網際服務軟體測試八、網際服務軟體管理九、元件式網際服務應用軟體開發十、服務導向式網際服務應用軟體開發
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with full knowledge and technologies of Web-based software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the practices, concepts, methods, and techniques for producing high quality Web-based software. The course will cover the following topics: 1.Introduction to Web-based Software Engineering2.The Structure of Web-based Systems3.The Software Process for Web-based Applications4.The General Process Framework for Web-based Applications5.Formulating and Analyzing Web-based Systems6.Design of Web-based Applications7.Testing of Web-based Applications8.Management Issues of Web-based Applications9.Component-Based Web Application Development Approach10.Service-Oriented Web Application Development Approach

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生個人軟體程序的概念與技術，幫助學生建立相關的技能以提升其開發軟體的能力。透過原理與實作的結合，引導學生學習軟體專案計畫、追蹤、測量、與分析等方法，並學習如何使用這些方法來改善個人軟體開發的效能。課程內容包括下列主題：一、個人軟體程序策略二、個人軟體程序基準三、計劃I - 計劃的流程四、計劃II - 軟體規模測量五、計劃III - 軟體規模估算六、計劃IV - 資源與時程估算七、個人軟體程序測量八、設計與程式碼檢驗九、個人軟體程序擴展十、個人軟體程序應用
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	The objective of this course is to introduce the concepts and technologies of personal software process and help students build the skills required for doing better development work. In particular, students will learn comprehensive planning, tracking, measuring, and analysis methods and learn how to use these techniques to improve their personal performance in developing software projects. The course will cover the following topics: 1.The Personal Software Process Strategy 2.The Baseline Personal Process 3.Planning I - The Planning Process 4.Planning II - Measuring Software Size 5.Planning III - Estimating Software Size 6.Planning IV - Resources and Schedules Estimating7.Measurements in the Personal Software Process 8.Design and Code Reviews9.Scaling Up the Personal Software Process10.Using the Personal Software Process

description.zh: 知識經濟時代「創新研發」已成為產業最重要的競爭力之一，配合此一趨勢的發展，政府積極招攬國外企業來台設立創新研發中心，同時鼓勵本國企業在台設立創新研發總部，企圖使台灣成為企業的全球研發中心，支援企業從事全球佈局活動所需之技術能力，並使研發服務業成為台灣的重要產業。因此，產品研發管理人才已成為企業最重要的幹部。本所之產品研發管理教授課程包含: 新產品開發流程、品質機能展開、DFM-設計易製化、6 σ設計、田口品質工程、產品資料管理(PDM)、產品開發協同設計與智慧財產權專利申請製作等主題。
description.en: To meet the trends of innovation and ODM for industries in Taiwan, the knowledge of Product R&D Management for IE field is crucial more than ever. Therefore, the course of Product R&D Management includes new product development process, Quality Function Deployment (QFD), Design for manufacturability (DFM), Six sigma and Design for Six sigma, Taguchi Method, Product Data Management (PDM), Collaborative product commerce and Patent Editing.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路與品牌策略之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與品牌策略的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路與品牌策略的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路與品牌策略的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路行為，通路策略及品牌功能，品牌權益與品牌策略等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, brand function, and brand strategy.

description.zh: 倉儲管理課程的目的在研究供應鏈中大型倉儲的各項管理技術，以期提高大型倉儲的管理效率，降低倉儲管理成本，進而提升產業整體的競爭力，其包含下列主題:1.倉儲管理簡介2.倉儲資料剖析3.倉儲績效評估4.棧板存取系統5.小型品項檢選系統6.撿貨作業7.倉儲空間規劃8.倉儲作業電腦化9.倉儲實例研討
description.en: The warehouse management course is to study the techniques to manage large warehouses in the supply chain systems with aims to improving productivity and reducing costs.1.Warehouse management basics2.Warehouse activity profiling3.Warehouse performance measurement4.Pallet systems5.Small items picking systems6.Order picking7.Warehouse layout8.Warehouse computerization9.Application studies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討的議題包括資訊系統需求規格的制定方法，資訊系統的建置平台，所使用技術與語言的趨勢，和其效果、效率及維護成本的評估。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: The topics of this course include the documentation methods of requirement and specification for information system, the economical development workplace, the trend of new developing techniques and language, and the evaluations of maintenance and developing effect. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in information system development.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

description.en: Introduction to SCADA systemsApplication of SCADA systemsRemote Terminal UnitsSensors and transducersData acquisitionCommunication system planningProtocolMan-machine interfaceCase study

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹生物無機化學，生物無機化學主要連貫生物學與無機化學。由無機化學與生物學的基本觀念開始介紹，課程內容包括生物學中的金屬離子化學及無機化學，及金屬離子在生命組織中的功用。也介紹各種不同的物理及化學方法對含金屬生物分子、過渡金屬錯合物及電子轉移化學的研究。
description.en: This course is focused on bioinorganic chemistry. Bioinorganic chemistry is the leading discipline at the interface of inorganic chemistry and biology.  This course begins with a brief review of the fundamental concepts in inorganic chemistry and biology.  The relationship between classical inorganic chemistry and the chemistry of metal ions in biology is introduced. Discussion are focused on the function and occurrence of essential metal ions in living organisms. An overview of the use of various physical and chemical methods available for the investigation of etal-containing biomolecules are presented. Studies of transition metal complexes and electron transfer chemistry are also covered.

description.zh: 1.本課程為電力系統之延伸與應用 2.藉由許多方法、理論之比較來加強系統容量與短路故障的觀念 3.觀念建立後，即使藉由簡單的計算，也能正確地分析該系統 4.藉由許多工業界的實例來分析，以證明方法的實用性，有助於研究及實務。

Objectives: To improve the related knowledge of materials on the electrical-mechanical devices.

description.en: Precision machinery, Machine installations, Precision mechanism, Movement properties of mechanism, Force, fluid and heat effects of structure, Mechanical control, Electrical control, Fluidic power control, Environmental issues。

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

description.zh: 本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
description.en: This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

description.zh: 硬體描述語言介紹、FPGA製作、特殊應用積體電路設計、CMOS邏輯電路設計與合成、數位電路時序調整、比較器、取樣保持電路、參考電壓與線性轉導電路、基本信號轉換電路介紹、數位類比轉換電路、類比數位轉換電路、超取樣轉換電路、鎖相迴路設計、雜訊與不良匹配分析等單元。
description.en: Verilog and VHDL, FPGA, ASIC, Combinational logic gates in CMOS, Timing issues in digital circuits, Comparator, Sample and Hold, Voltage reference, Translinear circuit, Data converter fundamentals, Nyquist-rate DAC, Nyquist-rate ADC, Oversampling converters, PLL, Noise and Mismatch.

description.zh: 在知識經濟時代裡，決定各企業間彼此競爭的最後勝負，不是產能、效率、更不是任何實體資產的多寡，卻是在於企業內的組織文化、人才素質與知識傳遞的能力，是否能夠比競爭對手更優秀。本課程的目的是希望讓學生對於存在組織內部與外部，及員工本身內隱及外顯之重要的知識面，做有系統的收集、創造、儲存、傳遞、分享、與利用的過程與管理。
description.en: In the times of knowledge-based economy, what a count in deciding the enterprise's success in the competition of others is not its productivity, efficiency, or not the amount of entity property, but the organization culture, manpower quality, and knowledge delivery ability.  The purpose of this curriculum hopes to let student understand how to systematically collect, create, store, deliver, share, and employ the information inside and outside the organization and the employee.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是希望學生了解創造思考的歷程與方法，並且與學校課程與教學方法相結合，以培養學生問題解決及創造思考的教學能力。
description.en: The purpose of this curriculum let the student to understand that the process and methods of creative thinking, and combine the content with curriculum and teaching in the schools.  To cultivating the teaching abilities of problem-solving and creative thinking were considered from it to educate the important target at present.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 概論，飛行器介紹，飛行空氣動力學，飛行運動方程式，穩定性與控制，旋翼空氣動力學，旋翼機控制，穩定與控制係數，各軸項之運動分析，控制響應，飛行自動控制設計與分析。
description.en: Introduction, Review of Flying Vehicles, Aerodynamics of Flight, Equations of Motion, Stability and Control, Rotor Aerodynamics, Control of Rotorcraft, Stability and Control Derivatives, Motion Analysis, Control Response, Design and Analysis of Automatic Flight System.

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理、高等IC製程   探討奈米矽元件之物理模型，及物理極限之深層探討。
description.en: The study on the physics limits and physics modeling of Nano silicon device.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生應用資訊科技來加強都市規劃與設計的能力。授課的主題涵蓋： 1. 電腦科技應用於都市規劃與設計相關領域的現況 2. 都市資訊系統的內涵及功能 3. 都市資訊系統的建構方法與工具 4. 都市資訊系統的應用實例
description.en: The course is designed to help students to utilize the power of newly developed computer technology to urban planning and design applications. The course content including: 1. Introduction of computer technology used in urban planning and design applications. 2. The content and functions of urban information system. 3. The methods and tools of constructing of urban information system. 4. Some applications of urban information system.

name.en: Special topics on designing SCADA Systems

description.zh: 監控系統介紹監控系統之應用遠端資訊設備感測器與轉換器資料擷取通訊系統規劃通訊協定人機介面實例研討
description.en: Introduction to SCADA systemsApplication of SCADA systemsRemote Terminal UnitsSensors and transducersData acquisitionCommunication system planningProtocolMan-machine interfaceCase study

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列主題：網路商業環境和未來發展，網路行銷，網路公關，網路商店之經營，線上廣告及交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safty.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 管理決策分析課程，包含主題為企業在確定情況下的決策與不確定情況下的決策分析。此課程提供大家作出良好決策程序的研究基礎。預先對機率、統計與計量分析方法的學習對此門課程是有幫助的。此課程中會描述以決策分析模型、步驟與如何形成每個決策模型步驟介紹、及再許多實務的運用情況。
description.en: Managerial Decision-Making includes the following topics: Decision Making under Certainty;  Decision Making under Uncertainty. This course provides the basis for the comprehensive study of procedures for making good decisions. A prior course in Probability, Statistics and Quantitative Analysis Methods are useful. This course presents a step-by-step procedure for decision making known as the rational model and describes how to perform each step, in detail, and illustrate their application in a variety of situations.

name.zh: 高速數位訊號完整設計

description.zh: 1.基礎傳輸線理論2.耦合3.非理想的傳輸線效應4.構裝、連接器與穿接腳5.電源供應系統6.電子電路的模擬
description.en: 1.Ideal Transmission line Fundamentals2.Crosstalk3.Nonideal Interconnect Issues4.Connectors, Packages, and Vias5.Nonideal Return Paths, Simultaneous Switching Noise and Power Delivery6.Electronic Circuits Simulations

description.zh: 本課程在介紹電腦視覺的基本概念與使用技術. 課程內容包含: 1.introduction to computer vision 2.geometric camera calibration 3.illumination 4.geometry of multiple view 5.structure from motion 6.segmentation by clustering 7.tracking models 8.model-based vision 9.image-based rendering.
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques of computer vision. The outline of this course includes: 1.introduction to computer vision 2.geometric camera calibration 3.illumination 4.geometry of multiple view 5.structure from motion 6.segmentation by clustering 7.tracking models 8.model-based vision 9.image-based rendering.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討如何結合硬體建設與柔性需求的社區規劃，以創造理性生活空間。並從都市規劃設計、公共安全、社區結構過程與社區組織等不同層面聯繫建築與都市設計議題，探討社區發展問題與對策。課程內容主要包括：1.社區定義、相關理論、形成、類型、環境問題及改善策略。2.社區建設與發展之規劃主題。3.社區鄰里單元規劃、土地細分與計畫整合單元開發、國民住宅社區  規劃。4.社區管理與維護。5.社區規劃/社區營造與民眾參與。6.社區規劃與社區文化、生活品質及防災。7.社區規劃實務：實例探討。
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the way of community planning is          concerned with achieving a between physical creativity and well-being of   the community and to explore the development issues and strategies to cope with. Thus the course including : 8.Definitions, theories, genesis and morphology of the community.9.Issues and strategies of community development and planning.10.Neighborhood nuit planning land subdivision and unit development planning and public housing community planning ..etc11.Management and maintenance of community.12.Community planning development and public participation.13.Community planning and culture living quality as well as public safety.14.Community planning practice.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題如：1.全球運籌之產業環境；2.全球運籌之經營模式與績效衡量；3.全球運籌之運作模式；4.全球運籌之4PL；5.全球運籌與之其他相關議題，如物流、金流及通關等；6.案例研討；7.我國全球運籌管理之未來發展。
description.en: This course includes following sections:1.Global logistics environment;2.Global logistics business model and performance   evaluation;3.Global logistics operation model;4.4PL in global logistics environment;5.Other issues related global logistics, like logistic flow   and customer;6.Case study.7.The furture trend of R.O.C. global logistics managment.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.en: Special selected topics on communication engineering area

description.zh: 通訊相關領域專題講座
description.en: Special selected topics on communication engineering area

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學校公共關係之理論與實務，提供修課學生對學校公共關係的認識。
description.en: The course is designed to develop the ability to manage the school public relation by exploring the concept and principles of school public relation and analyzing the current issues challenging all kinds of  educational institutes.

description.zh: 本課程以策略思考出發，對各種產業分析模式與競爭分析工具加以探討，同時透過個案研究方法，使同學熟悉這些分析工具的應用，並藉由不同產業的個案討論與辨證過程，增加同學對這些產業的整體競爭狀況之瞭解。
description.en: This course provides useful techniques for analyzing industries and the strategic logics of industrial organization. By this course training, students are expected to have sufficient capability to make comprehensive analysis of an industry and to provide possible (might be valuable) strategies for a specific firm.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4.	Transport policy and planning5.	Land use planning 6.	Public facilities construction7.	Comparative Overseas Planning8.	Housing Policy9.	Countryside Planning10.	Landscape Planning11.	Green communities12.	Site and property development13.	Urban theory research14.	Contemporary thought and commentary on planning and design

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

name.zh: 創意戶外公共家具設計專題

description.zh: 藉由對戶外公共空間意象表徵、地方環境的特色、歷史文化的痕跡及氣候之特性等的分析研究，配合週遭景觀及時代性，進而針對生活上的需求並提出具有創意的戶外公共家具設計的思維。
description.en: Lecture on theories of space superficial characteristics, environmental characteristics, history and culture influence. Discussing on relative research in the field of street furniture design will be carried on through the course. Case studies on application of street furniture design will be given for in depth discussions.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電化學基礎並探討有機反應電化學研究之應用技術及設備。
description.en: An introduction and fundamentals of method and equipment for the study of electroorganic reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.
